title: Ranked is bugged
body: you press ctrl-f and it doesn't show ping.

replies.body: Oh, well, it occasionally rebinds to alt-f4 for some reason. Just use those buttons until Riot fixes. Apparently ctrl changes to alt and f changes to f4
What has this got to do with ranked.

i hate that

i need to see if im part of the 8 ping master race

jk i always get around 40
